name: Perdoceo Education Corporation
description: Perdoceo Education Corporation is a leading provider of postsecondary education, specializing in online and on-campus programs. The company operates through its subsidiaries, including Colorado Technical University (CTU) and the American InterContinental University (AIU). Founded in 1994, Perdoceo has a mission to empower students to achieve their educational and career goals by providing innovative learning solutions and flexible degree programs tailored to meet the demands of a dynamic workforce. The university offers a range of undergraduate and graduate degrees across various disciplines, including business, information technology, health care, and criminal justice. Perdoceo is committed to maintaining high standards of academic quality and student satisfaction, leveraging advanced technology to deliver engaging educational experiences. The company prioritizes accessibility and affordability, ensuring that students from diverse backgrounds can pursue their education without financial barriers. With a focus on student outcomes, Perdoceo continuously evaluates and enhances its programs to ensure they align with industry trends and employer needs, fostering a strong connection between education and career success.
